title: LP-Based Instructional Design Scenarios for Integrated Competency Development in Middle School Energy Units

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory science education (energy concepts, scientific inquiry methods) and pedagogical theories (learning progression, competency-based education)
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers master integrated competency development methods using Learning Progressions (LP) in designing middle school energy units

learning_goals: Learners can perform step-by-step instructional design for middle school energy units by applying the Learning Progressions (LP) framework.
Learners can develop integrated assessment tools linking energy concepts with scientific explanatory abilities.
The effectiveness of LP-based instructional design is validated through experimental video analysis and pre-post assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
